Parameters.Parameter: {"vector_layers":[{"id":"country_fill","description":"Polygons useful for shading the fill color of countries.","fields":{"type":"String","name":"String","color":"Number"}},{"id":"playas","description":"","fields":{"name":"String"}},{"id":"urban_areas","description":"","fields":{}},{"id":"water","description":"Ocean and lake polygons","fields":{}},{"id":"ice","description":"","fields":{}},{"id":"railroads","description":"","fields":{}},{"id":"roads","description":"Highway, major road, and ferry route lines","fields":{"ogc_fid":"Number","scalerank":"Number","featurecla":"String","type":"String","sov_a3":"String","note":"String","edited":"String","name":"String","namealt":"String","namealtt":"String","routeraw":"String","question":"Number","length_km":"Number","toll":"Number","ne_part":"String","label":"String","label2":"String","local":"String","localtype":"String","localalt":"String","labelrank":"Number","ignore":"Number","add":"Number","rwdb_rd_id":"Number","orig_fid":"Number","prefix":"String","uident":"Number","continent":"String","expressway":"Number","level":"String"}},{"id":"geographic_lines","description":"","fields":{"name":"String","featurecla":"String"}},{"id":"admin_1_lines","description":"State & province boundaries","fields":{"featurecla":"String"}},{"id":"admin_0_lines","description":"Country boundaries","fields":{"type":"String","class":"String"}},{"id":"country_labels","description":"","fields":{"ogc_fid":"Number","sr_sov_a3":"String","sr_adm0_a3":"String","sr_gu_a3":"String","sr_su_a3":"String","sr_subunit":"String","sr_brk_a3":"String","sr_br_name":"String","scalerank":"Number","featurecla":"String"}},{"id":"land_ocean_labels","description":"","fields":{"ogc_fid":"Number","scalerank":"Number","featurecla":"String"}},{"id":"places","description":"Points for labeling cities and towns","fields":{"name":"String","scalerank":"Number"}}]}

Datasource.Parameter: ( SELECT geom, type, name, mapcolor7 AS color FROM ne_110m_admin_0_countries WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) <= 2 AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom, type, name, mapcolor7 AS color FROM ne_50m_admin_0_countries WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) IN (3,4) AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom, type, name, mapcolor7 AS color FROM ne_10m_admin_0_countries WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND geom && !bbox! ) AS data

( SELECT geom, name FROM ne_50m_playas WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) IN (3,4) AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom, name FROM ne_10m_playas WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND geom && !bbox! ) AS data

( SELECT geom FROM ne_50m_urban_areas WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) IN (3,4) UNION ALL SELECT geom FROM ne_10m_urban_areas WHERE geom && !bbox! AND z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND scalerank-1 <= z(!scale_denominator!) ) AS data

-- This layer combines oceans & lakes ( -- 1:110,000,000 scale SELECT geom FROM ne_110m_ocean WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) <= 2 AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom FROM ne_110m_lakes WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) <= 2 AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL -- 1:50,000,000 scale SELECT geom FROM ne_50m_ocean WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) IN (3,4) AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom FROM ne_50m_lakes WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) IN (3,4) AND geom && !bbox! AND scalerank-1 <= z(!scale_denominator!) UNION ALL -- 1:10,000,000 scale SELECT geom FROM ne_10m_ocean WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom FROM ne_10m_lakes WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND geom && !bbox! AND scalerank-1 <= z(!scale_denominator!) ) AS data

( -- Glaciated areas SELECT geom FROM ne_110m_glaciated_areas WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) <= 2 AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom FROM ne_50m_glaciated_areas WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) IN (3,4) AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom FROM ne_10m_glaciated_areas WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL -- Antarctic ice shelves -- No 110m included so 50m is used at z0-2 as well SELECT geom FROM ne_50m_antarctic_ice_shelves_polys WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) <= 4 AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom FROM ne_10m_antarctic_ice_shelves_polys WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND geom && !bbox! ) AS data

( SELECT geom FROM ne_10m_railroads WHERE geom && !bbox! AND CASE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) = 5 AND scalerank <= 5 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) = 6 AND scalerank <= 7 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 7 THEN TRUE END ) AS data

( SELECT * FROM ne_10m_roads WHERE geom && !bbox! AND CASE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) = 4 AND scalerank <= 3 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) = 5 AND scalerank <= 5 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) = 6 AND scalerank <= 7 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 7 THEN TRUE END ) AS data

-- In order to draw sharper lines when styling, line geometries -- are snapped to the center of the pixel ( SELECT name, featurecla, ST_SnapToGrid(geom,!pixel_width!/2,!pixel_height!/2,!pixel_width!,!pixel_height!) AS geom FROM ne_110m_geographic_lines WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) <= 2 AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT name, featurecla, ST_SnapToGrid(geom,!pixel_width!/2,!pixel_height!/2,!pixel_width!,!pixel_height!) AS geom FROM ne_50m_geographic_lines WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) IN (3,4) AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT name, featurecla, ST_SnapToGrid(geom,!pixel_width!/2,!pixel_height!/2,!pixel_width!,!pixel_height!) AS geom FROM ne_10m_geographic_lines WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND geom && !bbox! ) AS data

( SELECT geom, featurecla FROM ne_50m_admin_1_states_provinces_lines WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) IN (3,4) AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom, featurecla FROM ne_10m_admin_1_states_provinces_lines_shp WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND geom && !bbox! ) AS data

( SELECT geom, 'Land' AS type, CASE WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'line of control%' THEN 'control' WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'disputed%' THEN 'dispute' WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'lease%' THEN 'lease' WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'overlay%' THEN 'overlay' ELSE 'boundary' END AS class FROM ne_110m_admin_0_boundary_lines_land WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) <= 2 AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom, 'Land' AS type, CASE WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'line of control%' THEN 'control' WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'disputed%' THEN 'dispute' WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'lease%' THEN 'lease' WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'overlay%' THEN 'overlay' ELSE 'boundary' END AS class FROM ne_50m_admin_0_boundary_lines_land WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) IN (3,4) AND geom && !bbox! UNION ALL SELECT geom, type, CASE WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'line of control%' THEN 'control' WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'disputed%' THEN 'dispute' WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'lease%' THEN 'lease' WHEN featurecla ILIKE 'overlay%' THEN 'overlay' ELSE 'boundary' END AS class FROM ne_10m_admin_0_boundary_lines_land WHERE z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND geom && !bbox! ) AS data
( SELECT * FROM ne_10m_admin_0_label_points WHERE geom && !bbox! AND z(!scale_denominator!) >= 3 AND scalerank <= 3 ORDER BY scalerank ) AS data

( SELECT * FROM ne_10m_land_ocean_label_points WHERE geom && !bbox! AND CASE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 3 AND scalerank <= 1 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 4 AND scalerank <= 2 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND scalerank <= 3 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 6 AND scalerank <= 4 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 7 THEN TRUE END ) AS data

( SELECT geom, name, scalerank FROM ne_10m_populated_places WHERE geom && !bbox! AND CASE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 3 AND scalerank = 0 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 4 AND scalerank <= 2 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 5 AND scalerank <= 4 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 6 AND scalerank <= 6 THEN TRUE WHEN z(!scale_denominator!) >= 7 THEN TRUE END -- Ordering the query properly is important. Points that are selected -- first are given priority for labeling. ORDER BY scalerank ASC, pop_max DESC ) AS data
